import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.bf615ff1:
plt.figure(figsize=(12, 12))
plt.legend(fontsize=10)
plt.tick_params(labelsize=10)
ax=sns.scatterplot(x=kmean_results['energy'],y=kmean_results['acousticness'],hue=kmean_results['Cluster'],size=kmean_results['liveness'],data=kmean_results,sizes=(20,200))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
ax.legend(loc='upper left',bbox_to_anchor=(1,1))

source.18c0b546:
1. Objective

I tried clustering to understand what kind of segmentations tracks of Oasis have.

2. Approach

Clustering and PCA by PyCaret

3. Insight

I found 5 clusters in tracks of Oasis. The picture shows plotted 5 clusters by 2 principal components.

![スクリーンショット 2021-09-29 午前3.19.46 2.png](attachment:db42a81d-781d-4fb0-93cd-4b3f3f961175.png)


So I also tried to understand what PC1 and PC2 mean. Fisrt, I found that there are some difference between Cluster 1 and others, especially in 'acousticness' and 'energy'.

![スクリーンショット 2021-09-29 午前3.50.18.png](attachment:594d6c08-7baa-4e5e-9aba-5a33db0f3815.png)

![スクリーンショット 2021-09-29 午前4.38.44.png](attachment:6304e844-46ec-43a9-a7df-f7b6f4785c7d.png)

Second, I found that there are some difference between Cluster 4 and others in 'instrumentalness'.

![スクリーンショット 2021-09-29 午前4.45.27.png](attachment:ad7066d4-676a-4c30-9778-7652f29f9e80.png)

So PC 1 seems to be influenced by 'acousticness' and 'energy'. And PC 2 seems tobe influenced by 'instrumentalness'.
